topText: Hey there! I'm Patrice, a Software Engineer and speedcuber who's been twisting and turning cubes for quite some time. Speedcubing has been my go-to hobby, and after noticing a gap in the online space for speedcubing enthusiasts like me, I decided to do something about it. That's how SpeedCubeShare came to life in 2023 – my biggest side project that's grown beyond my expectations.

section1.title: What We Do
section1.text: At SpeedCubeShare, we're not reinventing the cube – we're just making it easier for you to connect with fellow speedcubers. It's a space where you can share your wins, discuss your favorite cubes, swap algorithms, and simply be part of a community that gets your obsession with cubing.

item1.title: Profile, Your Way
item1.text: Customize your profile to reflect your speedcubing journey – share your best times, favorite cubes, and anything else that makes your cubing experience unique.

item2.title: Algorithms Made Easy
item2.text: No need to search endlessly for algorithms. Our library is here to help you brush up on your skills and maybe even discover a few new tricks. Feel free to contribute your own!

item3.title: Stats & Goals
item3.text: Keep track of your progress, set goals, and revel in your accomplishments. We're all about celebrating those personal bests.

item4.title: Cube Talk
item4.text: Wondering which cube to try next? Dive into cube reviews and recommendations from the community to make an informed choice.

item5.title: Chill Forums
item5.text: Join in on the laid-back discussions, ask questions, or just lurk – it's all good. Connect with speedcubers who get your love for the cube.

section3.title: Join Us
section3.text: Whether you're a speedcubing veteran or just starting out, SpeedCubeShare is here for you. Let's keep it casual, fun, and focused on what we love – solving cubes.
